channel.title: Comments on: MADPASSâ€™s First Birthday: They Grow Up So Fast!
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Tim Benninghoff
item.dc:creator: Tim Benninghoff
item.description: Thanks for the great perspective, and for your tireless enthusiasm and great ideas on behalf of MADPASS. We are pretty proud of MADPASS, and I look forward to many more years of innovation and camaraderie. We've accomplished so much in a short year, and I can't wait to see what we'll come up with next! Cheers to the best PASS chapter in the world! :)
